display_html:
class GenomeState gt a where
  • takeGenome :: gt -> Genome a
name: GenomeState takeGenome

display_html:
class ObjectiveFunction f a where
  • evalObjective :: f -> [Genome a] -> Population a
name: ObjectiveFunction evalObjective

display_html: type CrossoverOp a = [Genome a] -> Rand ([Genome a], [Genome a])
name: CrossoverOp

display_html: type StepGA m a = Cond a -> PopulationState a -> m (StepResult (Population a))
name: StepGA

display_html:
data Cond a
  • = Generations Int
  • | IfObjective ([Objective] -> Bool)
  • | forall b.Eq b => GensNoChange {
    • c'maxgens :: Int
    • c'indicator :: [Objective] -> b
    • c'counter :: Maybe (b, Int)
    }
  • | Or (Cond a) (Cond a)
  • | And (Cond a) (Cond a)
name: Cond Generations IfObjective GensNoChange Or And c'maxgens c'indicator c'counter

display_html:
data StepResult a
  • = StopGA a
  • | ContinueGA a
name: StepResult StopGA ContinueGA

name: runGA

name: runIO

name: nextSteadyState

display_html:
data Cond a
  • = Generations Int
  • | IfObjective ([Objective] -> Bool)
  • | forall b.Eq b => GensNoChange {
    • c'maxgens :: Int
    • c'indicator :: [Objective] -> b
    • c'counter :: Maybe (b, Int)
    }
  • | Or (Cond a) (Cond a)
  • | And (Cond a) (Cond a)
name: Cond Generations IfObjective GensNoChange Or And c'maxgens c'indicator c'counter

display_html:
data LogHook a m w where
  • WriteEvery :: (Monad m, Monoid w) => Int -> (Int -> Population a -> w) -> LogHook a m w
name: LogHook WriteEvery

display_html:
data IOHook a
  • = DoEvery {
    • io'n :: Int
    • io'action :: Int -> Population a -> IO ()
    }
  • | StopWhen (IO Bool)
  • | TimeLimit {
    • io't :: Double
    }
name: IOHook DoEvery StopWhen TimeLimit io'n io'action io't
